attributes.action: Government to Create a Capped limit law on landlords renting housing property
attributes.additional_details:
Government to Create a Capped limit law on landlords renting housing property

Reasons

: Landlords who over charge and make huge amounts of profits from housing benefits

:Save money for the government as less housing benefits would need paying

:Help a majority of the UK family's in poverty who live in private rental. make a better future for them self's.

:Help more people who live in private renting, more of a change of saving for a deposit for a mortgage, as renting is dead end money.

The government always goes on about how they want to make the UK a better future for us and for the younger generation... well government do something about it!

Make this a law and save out money and help many people in the UK.
